scripts.prepublish: microbundle src/index.js -f cjs --no-sourcemap --external none --target node && mkdir -p ./dist/shims && cp -r ./src/shims/* ./dist/shims
scripts.build: microbundle build src/index.js -f cjs --no-sourcemap --external none --target node && mkdir -p ./dist/shims && cp -r ./src/shims/* ./dist/shims
